EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.Cork Email Reminder 12/4
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow 12/4 at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop in Cork
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up tomorrow, December 4, in Cork. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Thursday, December 4, 2014 8:00am - 5:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/cork>
LOCATION Cork Institute of Technology Bishopstown Cork, Ireland Please find general directions to CIT here <http://www.cit.ie/citcontacts/mapsandtravel> and for a detailed map of the campus at CIT here <http://www.cit.ie/contentfiles/maps/cit-map-2013.pdf>.
From Rossa Avenue take the "Main Entrance & Exit" into CIT at the roundabout, continue down this road passing the Nimbus and Rubicon Centre (see detailed map legend 15/16) on your right, at the next roundabout take the second exit to the student/visitors car park behind Athletics Stand & Track (see detailed map legend 18).
Once parked make your way to the main building of CIT and enter the C-Block (see detailed map legend 3). There will be Pivotal Cloud Platform roadshow signage to direct you to the event.
Please aim to arrive at CIT before 8:15 as there will be heavy traffic in the area and parking will be limited after this time. If you have issues finding parking in the visitor parking area you may need to park in the Pay Parking areas, please refer to the detailed map. You can review the schedule for the 4th here <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/cork>.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
QUESTIONS? Contact us by email <mailto:info@pivotal.io>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
